text: The Portuguese Wikipedia (In Portuguese: Wikipédia em Português) is the Portuguese-language edition of Wikipedia. This edition was started in June 2001. It is the 15th largest edition by article count. It currently has over 1,000,000 articles.Statistics at Portuguese Wikipedia ==List of countries Wikipedia distributions== * Portuguese Wikipedia ** Angola ** Brazil ** Mozambique ** Portugal == References == == Other websites == * Portuguese Wikipedia main page Category:Wikipedias
title: Portuguese Wikipedia
